title: 이달의소녀탐구 #500 (LOONA TV #500)
summary:
🎉🎉 500th LOOΠΔ TV Episode! 🎉🎉
Everyone is pretty excited (and so are we) for this episode.
0:14 -- HaSeul: "HeeJin has been on LTV since Episode 1" - HeeJin: "And our 1000th episode will come quick just like this".There is nothing much besides the anticipation and the excitement for future projects.
Thank you for the 500 episodes! Road to 1000!
